0.2.0.name: wordpress/coupon-tab-for-directorypress-pp
0.2.0.description:
Coupon Tab (pp-coupon-tab) creates a new tab on the directory listing page of Directory Press. This tab is titled "Coupon" and displays the coupons listed by the registered users.

This plugin requires DirectoryPress and has been tested till version 7.1.3 with a slight modification. Please check installtion notes for details.
